results.title: Women's gymnastics
results.creator_credit: Dr Frank Ryan and Ryan Films
results.brief_description: Various routines - prescribed or imaginative - must be performed in both national and international competition; on the balance -beam, the uneven parallel bars; the side-horse, and floor exercises. Judges score from zero to ten, depending on the performer’s competence and confidence.

results.title: Wombling free
results.creator_credit: Lionel Jeffries, Ian Shand and Rank Organisation Film Productions
results.brief_description: Based on the original Womble Books and characters created by Elizabeth Beresford and on the BBC television series designed by Ivor Wood and produced by Graham Clutterbuck, this feature length film brings those dear fat furry Wombles to life and into our hearts. Since Adam and Eve, the Wombles’ mission is to keep the world a tidy place, to pick up the mess that human beings leave behind and to try and make human beings listen to the message that they should not litter the environment or create pollution of any kind. “Wombling free” takes us to England and the home of the Wombles of Wimbledon Common where we meet Madame Cholet, the most famous Womble cook in the whole world, Tomsk and Bungo, fat, greedy and lazy Orinoco, Wellington, a clever inventor who lacks confidence and Great Uncle Bulgaria (who narrates the story). Only those who believe in the Wombles can see the Wombles and whilst attempting to get the human beings to listen to his message of anti-litter anti-pollution, Bungo makes friends with a young schoolgirl named Felicity “Kim” Frogmorton who helps Bungo in convincing other human beings, including her parents, that Wombles do indeed exist. There are plots and sub-plots but this delightful story is filled with magic, music, song and dance and lots of funny fat furry characters who manage to spread the serious message of caring for the environment in a light-hearted, easy to understand way. Cast includes David Tomlinson, Frances de la Tour, Bernard Spear, Yasuko Nagazumi and Bonnie Langford as Kim.

results.title: Wombats
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Fauna”.
A program in which the two main species of wombat - the Common Wombat and the Hairy-Nosed Wombat, are compared. Also included is a reconstruction of the fascinating research done by a 15 year old schoolboy, in the 1960’s, who was the first person to venture into the long tunnels that the wombats dig as homes.

results.title: Wombat tale
results.creator_credit: Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT and Robbie Sands
results.brief_description:
An interactive animation on CD-ROM set in 1953 which tells the story of four wombats who dig their way to Russia in search of tomatoes. The user plays the part of a Russian farmer whose farm becomes a haven for four idealist wombats.
In Russian with English subtitles

results.title: Woman sesame oil maker [NTSC]
results.creator_credit: Xie Fei, Changchun Film Studio and Tianjin Film Studio
results.brief_description: A successful career woman, the manager of a Chinese-Japanese joint venture sesame oil factory, seeks comfort from the stress of her business, a violent, alcoholic husband, and a mentally retarded son in the arms of a married man. When the young girl she has arranged to marry her son discovers her affair, she responds with sympathy to her future mother-in-law’s problems. A surprisingly close relationship develops between the two women as they struggle together against tradition and circumstance to take control of their lives. Cast includes Siqin Gaowa, Wu Yujuan, Lei Kesheng and Chen Baoguo. The film won the Golden Bear and Film Critic awards at the 43rd Berlin Film Festival 1993. In Mandarin with English subtitles.

results.title: Woman of the Year
results.creator_credit: George Stevens, Joseph L Mankiewicz and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: In this sophisticated comedy, the initial venture of that impeccable partnership of Katharine Hepburn and Spencer Tracy, Hepburn plays a renowned columnist and celebrated expert on world affairs. Tracy works on the same newspaper as a sports writer. When Hepburn is nominated “Woman of the Year”, the fight is on between career and marriage.

results.title: Woman of the dunes = Suna no onna
results.creator_credit: Hiroshi Teshigahara, Tadashi Ono, Kiichi Ichikawa and Teshigahara Productions
results.brief_description: Out in the sand dunes a woman lives alone at the bottom of a pit. One day the local villagers bring a man to her. He can’t escape; gradually the two are drawn to each other. Out of this bizarre, if simple situation, Teshigahara builds an atmospheric, highly charged and remarkably sensual exploration of the human condition.
